arts.ttl: 'Something special' – McCoist hails West Ham star after what he did v Chelsea
arts.sum: Jarrod Bowen gives West Ham United “something special” after scoring on his return to the side against Chelsea, Ally McCoist has said. Speaking on talkSPORT... The post 'Something special' – McCoist hails West Ham star after what he did v Chelsea appeared first on West Ham Zone.

arts.ttl: Gary Neville slams VAR's Chelsea decisions as two calls leave Graham Potter furious
arts.sum: Chelsea prevailed over West Ham in the Premier League but were perhaps fortunate that Pedro Neto's equalising goal was awarded at Stamford Bridge after a foul on Jarrod Bowen was overlooked

arts.ttl: Graham Potter insists Chelsea got lucky for BOTH their goals as Blues come from behind to ruin West Ham boss' return to Stamford Bridge
arts.sum: KIERAN GILL AT STAMFORD BRIDGE: Graham Potter cursed his rotten luck on his Stamford Bridge return as he felt Chelsea relied on two fortunate goals to beat his West Ham side.

arts.ttl: Brighton striker Ferguson joins West Ham on loan
arts.sum: Brighton and Republic of Ireland striker Evan Ferguson joins West Ham on loan for the rest of the season.

arts.ttl: Graham Potter happy with 'significant' West Ham boost on transfer deadline day
arts.sum: Irons signed Evan Ferguson before recalling James Ward-Prowse

arts.ttl: Graham Potter denied fairytale Chelsea return but West Ham offer genuine signs of encouragement
arts.sum: Hammers show fight despite lack of cutting edge

arts.ttl: West Ham player ratings vs Chelsea: Jarrod Bowen brings a spark as team-mates struggle
arts.sum: The forward marked his return from injury with a goal in the defeat

arts.ttl: Chelsea back into top four after beating West Ham and former boss Graham Potter
arts.sum: Aaron Wan-Bissaka’s own-goal in the 74th minute, from Cole Palmer’s effort, was enough to seal victory for the Blues at Stamford Bridge.

arts.ttl: LIVE: Chelsea drop goalkeeper Sanchez for visit of West Ham
arts.sum: Chelsea look to boost their push for the Champions League places against West Ham. ESPN has updates

arts.ttl: Bobby Zamora reacts as West Ham seal Deadline Day signing
arts.sum: Bobby Zamora has wished Evan Ferguson well after confirming his loan to West Ham on deadline day. The Republic of Ireland international completed his switch... The post Bobby Zamora reacts as West Ham seal Deadline Day signing appeared first on West Ham Zone.
